nodes.text: MediCure Pharmaceuticals, also known as MediCure Labs, was a front company research facility for the Galactic Republic's development of a cure for spice addiction. Located in the Ternion Building on the moon Nar Shaddaa, the facility was ransacked and the cure destroyed by Imperial forces during the Cold War.
MediCure Labs appears in the 2011 BioWare video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, where it is the site of the Imperial mission "Breaking the Cure" on Nar Shaddaa.
